mapper.select:
select * from server_complete_route sr left join proxyserver_info pi on sr.proxyserver_id=pi.id where 1=1
and sr.proxyserver_id like CONCAT('%',#{proxyserver_id},'%')
and pi.ip like CONCAT('%',#{proxyserver_ip},'%')
and sr.routeid like CONCAT('%',#{routeid},'%')
limit #{start},#{pageCount}

select count(*) from server_complete_route sr left join proxyserver_info pi on sr.proxyserver_id=pi.id where 1=1
and sr.proxyserver_id like CONCAT('%',#{proxyserver_id},'%')
and pi.ip like CONCAT('%',#{proxyserver_ip},'%')
and sr.routeid like CONCAT('%',#{routeid},'%')
